```{r global, include=FALSE}
# load data in 'global' chunk so it can be shared by all users of the dashboard
library(tidyverse)
library(naniar)
data(airquality)
```


Column {.sidebar}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
  
```{r}
selectInput('xcol', 'X Variable', names(airquality))

selectInput('ycol', 'Y Variable', names(airquality),
            selected=names(airquality)[[2]])
```

Column
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
  
### Scatter plot
  
```{r}
# Combine the selected variables into a new data frame
selectedData <- reactive({
  airquality[, c(input$xcol, input$ycol)] 
})



renderPlot({
  ggplot(selectedData(), aes_string(x=input$xcol, y=input$ycol)) + geom_point()
})
```
